attributes.additional_details: I would like the home office to consider approving me a passport and have the freedom for jobs as any normal british citizen. In the six years ive lived in the uk Ive not commited any criminal offences I am genuine Citizen and want to be treated like everybody else FAIRLY and DECENTLY. My situation is causing me ilness {mental health issues, hypotension and black outs} My medication is lostan potassium 100mg & 10mg, Citalopram 60mg. I have no FREEDOM / HUMAN RIGHTS. Please consider my application thanks.

rejection.details: It is not the purpose of e petitions to deal with personal issues or individual applications.
